document_data.name: House of the Binder
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of the Binder''' was a large temple of [[Oghma]] located in the fortress-keep of [[Candlekeep]] by the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]] and still standing in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
document_data.Description: The temple could be found on the western side of the Court of Air, within the keep's outer wall. It was spacious enough to allow for a number of his followers to set up camp and socialize within.
